fields.name: description
fields.label: Name for AE field
fields.description: This is the name that will be used to store the value in the database.  It will be created by the module, and should not already exist on the form. To use this field in calculations and constraints, the field name will need to be manually typed in followed by <enter>.  If referencing this field on another form, the full path (i.e., groupName.form.name.formName/field_name) will need to be typed in followed by <enter>. Please contact your Prelude PM for assistance.

fields.name: cdash
fields.label: Short name for AE field (CDASH)
fields.description: Define an optional short database (or CDASH) name here. Typical format is 8 characters (all upper case).

fields.name: roles_can_edit_field
fields.label: Role codes that can edit AE field
fields.description: These are the role codes that can edit the main AE description field within this module. If left blank, the edit privileges will be applied to the field from the Form Permissions.

fields.name: roles_can_edit
fields.label: Role codes that can edit coding field(s)
fields.description: These are the role codes that can edit the coding field(s) within this module. If left blank, the edit privileges will be applied to the coding field(s) from the Form Permissions.
